isNotEmpty.isEqual: VIDEO_CHAT_ROOM_TITLE LIKE '%' || #search_keyword# || '%' OR VIDEO_CHAT_ROOM_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #search_keyword# || '%' OR EMP_CODE LIKE '%' || #search_keyword# || '%'

sqlMap.select: select count(video_chat_room_code) from video_chat_room where video_chat_room_delete = 'n'

SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, Z.* FROM ( select a.video_chat_room_code, a.video_chat_room_date, b.project_name, c.emp_name , count(d.emp_code) as emp_cnt, a.video_chat_room_title, a.video_chat_status from video_chat_room a, project b, emp c , video_chat_join d where a.project_code = b.project_code and a.emp_code = c.emp_code and a.video_chat_room_code = d.video_chat_room_code and d.emp_code = #emp_code#
group by b.project_name,a.video_chat_room_date, c.emp_name, a.video_chat_room_code, a.video_chat_room_title, a.video_chat_status ORDER BY video_chat_room_date) Z ) T
where t.rnum <= #startCount# and t.rnum >= #endCount#
ORDER BY t.RNUM DESC

select a.emp_code, a.video_chat_room_title, b.project_name, c.emp_name, a.video_chat_room_content, d.video_chat_join_intime, d.video_chat_join_outtime, a.video_chat_room_code from video_chat_room a, project b, emp c , video_chat_join d where a.project_code = b.project_code and a.video_chat_room_code = d.video_chat_room_code and d.emp_code = c.emp_code and d.video_chat_room_code = #video_chat_room_code# group by a.video_chat_room_title, a.emp_code, b.project_name, c.emp_name, a.video_chat_room_content, d.video_chat_join_intime, d.video_chat_join_outtime, a.video_chat_room_code
sqlMap.update: update video_chat_room set video_chat_room_title = #video_chat_room_title# , video_chat_room_content = #video_chat_room_content# where video_chat_room_code = #video_chat_room_code#
update video_chat_room set video_chat_room_delete = 'y' where video_chat_room_code = #video_chat_room_code#
sqlMap.select: select a.project_code, a.project_name, a.project_start, a.project_end from project a, join b, emp c where b.emp_code = #emp_code# and b.emp_code = c.emp_code and b.project_code = a.project_code group by a.project_code, a.project_name, a.project_start, a.project_end
